title: Cloudtax
author: Cloudtax
content: Amazon aws credit code1 - $10k = $3502 - $25k = $5503 - $100k = $1150What can I do with Amazon AWS Credit?Amazon AWS $$$ Credits can be used for varieties of AWS services, most commonly used for hosting servers such as EC2, and Lightsail; storage such as Amazon S3; Email such as Amazon SES, a complete list of what you can use these credits are as below:AMAZONROUTE53REGIONALCHINAAWS
